sentences.sentence: Data is retrieved from the location Data Provider — a Data Abstract Layer (DAL) component — which caches all locations in memory.
sentences.translation: 从位置数据提供者检索数据，这是一个数据抽象层(DAL)组件，在内存中缓存所有位置。

sentences.sentence: We can't just do what you want. I guess I could give you the DAL framework we used to build our DAL, I suppose.
sentences.translation: 我们不能按你想的那样做，我想我可以给你我们用于构建数据访问层的数据访问层框架，我猜测。

sentences.sentence: For now, these methods will just call directly into the DAL; we'll return later to add any needed business logic.
sentences.translation: 现在，这些方法将只能直接使用DAL中的那些方法，我们等会再来给他们加上一些业务逻辑。
